DOC.brief_summary: A randomize , control trial conduct pregnant woman randomize receive intervention - viewing prenatal education video breastfeed infant - sham intervention - viewing prenatal education video maternal nutrition physical activity pregnancy . Participants interview via telephone one , three , six month post-partum determine feed infant time frame .
DOC.detailed_description: Research assistant screen potential candidate University Virginia Health System Virginia Commonwealth University Primary Care Center approach potential participant standard clinic visit . The chart day 's patient screen prior approach woman invite enroll study . Following administration enrollment questionnaire , patient randomize intervention sham intervention arm study . The research assistant open study packet correspond study identification number contain intervention assignment . The research assistant load assign video DVD player ask patient view video . The participant blind video true intervention . Following delivery , research assistant abstract medical record woman infant . Data regard complication mother baby record length stay mother baby well information way baby feed hospital stay . Participants administer one-month follow-up questionnaire telephone . Follow-up questionnaire administer research staff enroll participant research assistant administer telephone questionnaire blind patient 's assigned intervention group . The three-month questionnaire administer telephone fashion one-month . The six-month questionnaire administer telephone . This questionnaire conclude study . A current address obtain time , child 's book mail participant thank complete study . For subject lose follow-up , contact baby 's pediatrician retrieve information questionnaire .
